message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with exceptional features and unparalleled quality. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $145?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Could you consider meeting me in the middle?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. To meet you halfway, how about we set the product price at $125? This allows us to maintain a reasonable profit while still being competitive.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our costs, I'm willing to offer the product at $120. This brings us to a fair agreement where both parties are satisfied.
